title: Daily Creation
prompt: A rusted mechanical robotic hand resting on a bed of digital moss, being consumed by blooming fractal cherry blossoms with glowing crystalline petals. Soft pastel pink (#FFB6C1) and sky blue (#89CFF0) petals unfold in complex Fibonacci patterns. The interaction of weathered copper gears and delicate digital flora. Depth of field, macro photography style, Unreal Engine 5, soft cinematic sunlight, intricate petal textures, nature reclaiming technology.
